alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 21 at 1:13PM MDT until August 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning from Noon through 8pm today for zones 417 and 418... .The combination of gusty winds, very warm temperatures and low humidity will create near critical fire weather conditions especially for the western portions of these zones. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITIES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417 AND 418... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 417. Fire weather zone 418. * WIND...Southwest at speeds of 25 to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...12 to 15 percent. * HAINES...4 * THUNDERSTORMS...No Thunderstorms are expected. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland
